value.title: Reuse M code (M functions) created by others easily
value.excerpt: In today's video I am collaborating with Imke Feldmann to bring you the best that M or Power Query has to offer.  We will show you how you can easily re-use M functions in your reports.  Link to the sources: http://www.thebiccountant.com/2017/12/11/date-datesbetween-retrieve-dates-between-2-dates-power-bi-power-query/

value.title: Show rows with no data - Power BI Tips & Tricks #33
value.excerpt: By default, column headings are only displayed in your reports if they contain data. For example, if you were displaying revenue by country and had no sales in Norway, then Norway would not appear anywhere in your visualization.  In this video we will show you how to display empty categories or show

value.title: 3 ways to try Power BI
